message: The only thing better than a dog is a dog with a slice of pizza.
Love is a four-legged word. - Unknown
I wonder if other dogs think poodles are members of a weird religious cult. - Rita Rudner
Dogs’ lives are too short. Their only fault, really. - Agnes Sligh Turnbull
If there are no dogs in Heaven, then when I die I want to go where they went. - Will Rogers
A dog is one of the few things in life that is exactly what it seems. - Unknown
My goal in life is to be as good of a person my dog already thinks I am.
No one appreciates the very special genius of your conversation as the dog does. - Christopher Morley
In a perfect world, every dog would have a home and every home would have a dog. - Unknown
The more boys I meet, the more I love my dog. - Carrie Underwood
Dogs are our link to paradise. They don't know evil or jealousy or discontent. - Milan Kundera
Every dog has his day, unless he loses his tail, then he has a weak-end. - June Carter Cash
My little dog—a heartbeat at my feet. - Edith Wharton
Dogs laugh, but they laugh with their tails. - Max Eastman
You can usually tell that a man is good if he has a dog who loves him. - W. Bruce Cameron
The better I get to know men, the more I find myself loving dogs. - Charles de Gaulle
Some days you're the dog, some days you're the hydrant. - Unknown
Dogs leave paw prints on our hearts. - Unknown
What do dogs do on their day off? Can’t lie around – that’s their job! - George Carlin
Dogs are how people would be if the important stuff is all that mattered to us. - Ashly Lorenzana
I think dogs are the most amazing creatures; they give unconditional love. For me, they are the role model for being alive. - Gilda Radner
Dogs are like chocolates. You can't just have one.
To sit with a dog on a hillside on a glorious afternoon is to be back in Eden, where doing nothing was not boring – it was peace. - Milan Kundera
Dogs are miracles with paws. - Susan Ariel Rainbow Kennedy
I wonder if my dog dreams of me.
Dogs don’t rationalize. They don’t hold anything against a person. They don’t see the outside of a human but the inside of a human. - Cesar Millan
Handle every situation like a dog. If you can’t eat it or play with it, just pee on it and walk away.
A dog is the only thing that can mend a crack in your broken heart. - Judy Desmond
If I could be half the person my dog is, I’d be twice the human I am.
Dogs have boundless enthusiasm but no sense of shame. I should have a dog as a life coach. - Moby
Dogs are proof that the best things in life are free.
The bond with a true dog is as lasting as the ties of this earth will ever be. - Konrad Lorenz
I work hard so my dog can have a better life.
My sunshine doesn’t come from the skies. It comes from the love that’s in my dog’s eyes. - Unknown
A dog can express more with his tail in minutes than an owner can express with his tongue in hours. - Unknown
Life is ruff when you're a dog, but at least you're not a cat.
Dogs’ lives are too short. Their only fault, really. - Agnes Sligh Turnbull
The greatness of a nation and its moral progress can be judged by the way its animals are treated. - Mahatma Gandhi
Live like someone left the gate open.
Dogs are not our whole life, but they make our lives whole. - Roger Caras
The dog lives for the day, the hour, even the moment. - Robert Falcon Scott
A dog is the only thing on earth that loves you more than he loves himself. - Josh Billings

Dogs don’t know about beginnings, and they don’t speculate on matters that occurred before their time. Dogs also don’t know—or at least don’t accept—the concept of death. With no concept of beginnings or endings, dogs probably just exist in an eternal now. - Stanley Coren
If my dog makes you uncomfortable, I’d be happy to lock you in the other room.
The more I see of men, the more I admire dogs. - Jeanne-Marie Roland
Dogs’ lives are too short. Their only fault, really. - Agnes Sligh Turnbull
If I had a dollar for every time my dog made me smile, I’d be a millionaire.
A dog is the only thing on earth that loves you more than he loves himself. - Josh Billings
Dogs are not our whole life, but they make our lives whole. - Roger Caras
A dog can snap you out of any kind of bad mood that you’re in faster than you can think of. - Jill Abramson
If you want the best seat in the house, move the dog.
I think dogs are the most amazing creatures; they give unconditional love. For me, they are the role model for being alive. - Gilda Radner
The only creatures that are evolved enough to convey pure love are dogs and infants. - Johnny Depp
You can usually tell that a man is good if he has a dog who loves him. - W. Bruce Cameron
Dogs are our link to paradise. They don't know evil or jealousy or discontent. - Milan Kundera
